page.title: 14LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: Lots of people like swimming.This is a very popular activity because it is refreshing in hot weather.Riding bikes is also very popular with boys. Lots of people watch T.V. in their spare time as it is very relaxing. Most people like sports.The most popular sports are tennis and football. Riding horses and looking after them is very popular too because you get to know the horse like a friend. Boys like playing football and rugby because it is athletic.We surveyed 273 children in our school.We asked "What do you do in your spare time?RESULTS bingo=15,Gardening=70,D.I.Y.=43,Sports =24,Watch Sports=44,T.V=77.Children don't like:Jobs,Maths,Tidying,Making Bed,Helping.Here are just somethings they do like doing :Clubs,Sports,and collecting various things.
